argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_modvalr | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( A mod B ) = ( A - ( ( |_ ` ( A / B ) ) x. B ) ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( A - ( ( |_ ` ( A / B ) ) x. B ) ) = ( A mod B ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_recn | |- ( A e. RR -> A e. CC ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 5 |  | #P_rerpdivcl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( A / B ) e. RR ) |
| 6 |  | #P_flcl | |- ( ( A / B ) e. RR -> ( |_ ` ( A / B ) ) e. ZZ ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_zcnd | |- ( ( A / B ) e. RR -> ( |_ ` ( A / B ) ) e. CC ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( |_ ` ( A / B ) ) e. CC ) |
| 9 |  | #P_rpcn | |- ( B e. RR+ -> B e. CC ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 11 | 8, 10 | #P_mulcld | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( ( |_ ` ( A / B ) ) x. B ) e. CC ) |
| 12 |  | #P_modcl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( A mod B ) e. RR ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_recnd | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( A mod B ) e. CC ) |
| 14 | 4, 11, 13 | #P_subaddd | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( ( A - ( ( |_ ` ( A / B ) ) x. B ) ) = ( A mod B ) <-> ( ( ( |_ ` ( A / B ) ) x. B ) + ( A mod B ) ) = A ) ) |
| 15 | 2, 14 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( ( ( |_ ` ( A / B ) ) x. B ) + ( A mod B ) ) = A ) |
